ygData.subject: Re: RE: Sylly 1, Qjahe 1, Harm 1; Lady Vox 0 (truncated)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... ;-) ... I lost two bubbles of health everytime I was hit with AE. ... I wish there was a way to find out about this.  Maybe next time I ll go without cold
ygData.messageBody:
> Ack! I lent out my Runed Bone Fork and forgot to get it back,
> thanks for reminding me.

;-)

> It was cast twice then. The AE at full damage doesn't even do
> 800. ~400 a shot is still high though and I've never seen that much
> damage when I was at Vox, even without a bard in my group with Miriana
> (Naggy is a different story).

I lost two bubbles of health everytime I was hit with AE.

> Yeah, unfortunately we have no way of knowing how resists factor
> in to the actual damage number, but most people reported dramatic
> improvements.

I wish there was a way to find out about this. Maybe next time I'll
go without cold gear, to see what happens.

> Of fg's, or monsters in planes, or.... Hehe, any multi group
> event is "stare at wall" time for me :).

Clerics <g> You all have the best job, but the worst scenery.

> According to Gallenite, all 3 deaths were due to LD's (and thereby
> unhealable). The real solution is to make 24 people sit in the king room
> while the other 24 attack Vox. With so many people going LD if you throw
> 48 people at something you've cut your effectiveness by nearly half
> anyways. Of course, no one wants to have the job of picking the 24 to
> stay behind.

That brings a sore point up too. Gallenite picked all Pantheon
members in the first 24 people, and sent all the others save a
few to wait in the king room. We waited until he said to come
in which was about 30 seconds. Two of the initial teams had
no bards in them, yet I was sitting in the king room twiddling
my fingers. Two clerics in my group as well, and one melee group
had none. Group layout was inconsistent, not sure why. I'm
starting to think Gallenite is holding something against me now,
as he was the person who looted Evensong from me. Ah well, time
will tell.

Harmonic.
